name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch spring-cloud-stream-beyond.md --exec "claat export -o temp/ spring-cloud-stream-beyond.md && ./node_modules/kill-port/cli.js --port 9090 && cd temp/spring-cloud-stream-beyond && claat serve"
